headline: Blackstone Explores $10B IPO or Sale for Ancestry.com
summary: Blackstone Inc. (NYSE:BX) is one of the best American stocks to buy and hold for the next 3 years. On September 25, Reuters reported that Private equity firm Blackstone is currently exploring strategic options for Ancestry.com, the popular genealogy and DNA testing platform. These options include pursuing an Initial Public Offering/IPO or an outright sale […]

headline: How Blackstone's (BX) Strategic Review of Ancestry.com Could Influence Portfolio Value Creation
summary: In late September 2025, Blackstone Inc. considered multiple strategic options for Ancestry.com, including a potential Initial Public Offering or sale, reportedly seeking a valuation of around US$10 billion for the Utah-based genealogy platform. This move highlights Blackstone's ongoing efforts to unlock value from its portfolio and capitalize on investor interest in technology-enabled consumer platforms. We'll explore how analyst optimism about Blackstone's earnings outlook, especially in...
